czs.warning_extraction_area_too_big: Extraction area too big for collection
czs.warning_extraction_area_missing: Missing an extraction area, only showing the data footprints
czs.error_some_elements_outside: Some elements were outside map extent limits.
czs.help_text:
Hi,
To submit your dynamic data extraction request, you must meet the following 3 criterias in the order of your choice:
  1. Select one or many collections
  2. Draw an extraction polygon on the map
  3. Type in your email address
  4. Optionnally, specify an EPSG
czs.feedback_text:
You want to contribute and provide feedback?

Contact us: geodiscoverydatadissemination-diffusiondesdonneesgeodecouverte@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
czs.email_tooltip: Enter the email on which to receive your download package link
czs.projection_tooltip: Optionally, specify an EPSG number for the extracted data
czs.draw_tooltip: Click to draw an extraction area on the map
czs.clear_tooltip: Click to clear the drawing from the map
czs.extract_tooltip: Click to start the extraction process
